text: Shelley Marie Hack (born July 6, 1947) is an American model, actress, producer, and political and media adviser. She is best known as the model of Revlon's Charlie perfume from the mid-1970s until the early 1980s. She is also known for playing Tiffany Welles in the fourth season of Charlie's Angels (1979â€“80). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people Category:Models from Connecticut Category:American television producers Category:American stage actors Category:Businesspeople from Connecticut Category:Actors from Greenwich, Connecticut
